message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135.
I understand Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $137.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $135 for the product.
